Adding Remy as I think he's been working on this code.

Thanks for the report, Scott. From the stack trace, it appears that some odd extension out there is not setting a name for the container factory. I don't appear to see any problems with the plugin.xml of the plug-ins I have in my workspace (IRC, XMPP, JXTA, and ECF generic). What do you have in your workspace?

The problem can be circumvented with a null check, but I'd rather find out which plug-in has the offending plugin.xml file.

Never mind, it's not any specific provider's problem. I had not considered the possibility of categories in a extension point.

Fixed in CVS HEAD, thanks again, Scott.
